title: The true cause of toxcity in League

replies.body:
That's what I tried to tell my friends when I locked in attack speed Karthus support.

They dodged.
Im disappointed in your friends. We've had bunch of fun with that stuff. Trump wall max Anivia ADC was great
People never really liked my full AD devourer Sion build.
How can you build AS on a champ with no Auto? Do you mean CDR?
Don't think all of our toxic friends are on par with a Jedi master

In their defense *nobody* is on par with Yoda.
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vrl3im25428/Voa7OZWcYiI/AAAAAAAAIyw/mgN6MDbwPns/s1600/yoda-guards-star-wars-prequels-sm-1430729021.gif

Just gonna leave this here
http://images.memes.com/character/meme/emperor-palpatine
Yoda still a badass, tho

**Darth Bane:** _"Someone said 'badass?'"_

**Darth Nihilus:** _**{Toilet noises of death as he eats a planet's 'soul' in all practicality}**_

**Darth Traya:** _"An amusing argument between you two... Tell me, have you two ever visited Malachor V?"_

**Exar Kun:** _"Killed anyone or did anything other than tell stories as a ghost? No...? Well, then..."_

**Grand Admiral Thrawn:** _"I already knew I would be on this thread."_

**Fay:** _"I do not wish to fight. But, if I must, I will... My lightsaber is not needed."_

**Galen Malek:** _"... Am I even canon to begin with?---"_

**Revan:** _"Forget him! Am **I** even CANON anymore?!"_

An' so on...
... I can name a few 'ore if ye said so an' if me felt like it.
I think it is really because the summoner's code is no longer valid since summoners don't exist anymore because of lore retcon.

i still have summoner lvl

MY ~~HEART ~~SUMMONER WILL ~~GO~~ LIVE ON

That's what I told myself when I started playing Dark Souls.

It didn't work

> [{quoted}](name=Skelenth,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=IOY2FERZ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-05-25T21:12:41.061+0000)
>
> That's what I told myself when I started playing Dark Souls.
> 
> It didn't work

Sounds like someone went hollow

Thankfully if you run around with Zweihander you can slap the shit out of tons of demoons

>Train yourself

OK so I know three different types of trains.

The mechanical train that goes on railroads.
The train as in "training"
And {{champion:14}} R

Which one is it?

#TheJoysOfMainingSion
